meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one millionth of an ampere.
meanings.sent1: I measured the tiny current in the circuit in microamperes.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device consumes only a few microamperes of electricity.
meanings.sent3: It was so quiet in the room that you could hear a microamperes drop.
meanings.sent4: The flow of ideas in his mind was as minuscule as microamperes in a wire.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully monitored the microamperes to ensure accurate readings.
